title: Out Of Time Man
lyrics:
[intro] (Am) (G) (C) (G) x4
 
(Am) I'm walking (G)out for love (C) (G)
(Am) I'm walking (G)bad really down (C) like a (G)cool breeze
(Am) I'm gonna (G)be late again, (C) driver wait (G) for me please
(Am) I'm runninâ€™ (G)all in vain
(C)Tryin' to catch this (G) xxxxin' (Am)train (G) (C) (G)
 
(Am)Time don't (G)fool me no more (C) (G)
(Am) I throw my (G)watch to the floor (C) was so (G)lazy
(Am)Time don't (G)do it again, (C) now I'm (G)stressed and (Am)strained
With (G)anger and (C)pain, in the (G)subway train
 
[chorus]
(Am) Now it's (G)half past two
(C) Long gone (G) the rendez-(Am)vous
Now it's (G)half past three
(C) Time made a (G)fool out of me
(Am) Now it's (G)half past four
(C) Oh baby (G)can't you see
(Am) No use in (G)waiting no more
(C) It's a timing (E)tragedy
I (E7)think it's nine when clock says ten
This (E7)girls wouldn't wait, for the out of time, out of time man
